#sidebar TableOfContents
The UnitType class is used to get information about a particular type of unit, such as the build time of a Lurker, or the mineral price of an Ultralisk.

Methods:

  * int getID();
  * std::string getName();
  * [Race] getRace();
  * std::pair< [UnitType]{{{*}}}, int > whatBuilds();
  * std::map< [UnitType]{{{*}}}, int > requiredUnits();
  * [TechType]{{{*}}} requiredTech();
  * int suppliesConsumed();
  * int suppliesProduced();
  * int maxHealth();
  * int maxShield();
  * int maxEnergy();
  * int mineralPrice();
  * int gasPrice();
  * int armor();
  * int buildTime();
  * int dimensionLeft();
  * int dimensionUp();
  * int dimensionRight();
  * int dimensionDown();
  * int tileWidth();
  * int tileHeight();
  * int damageFactor();
  * int groundDamage();
  * bool canProduce();
  * bool canAttack();
  * bool canMove();
  * bool isWorker();
  * bool isBuilding();
  * bool isAddon();
  * bool isFlyer();
  * bool isNeutral();
  * bool isOrganic();
  * bool isMechanical();
